backend/main.mo: Defines dashboard types and an actor with CRUD operations on MonthlyDashboard records stored in a map, including sorting and year-based filtering.
backend/migration.mo: Transforms old dashboard records to the new format by mapping centers to centerName and initializing empty coaches arrays.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for charting, center name simplification, and coach center fields.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides one-line summaries for all frontend source files and their roles in the dashboard application.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the DashboardPage in theme support and a notification toaster.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Center: Renders a grouped bar chart comparing revenue vs target per center for a selected month/year.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Coache: Editable table for managing coaches with fields for name, center, and salary, supporting add/remove and validation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Displays the dashboard header with logo, title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Metric: Shows four metric cards for revenue, target, total salaries, and salary output percentage.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Interactive editor for monthly dashboard data with field validation, coach management, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MonthS: Provides a styled month input for choosing the active dashboard month.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout state.
React Query hooks to fetch, save, and delete monthly dashboard records via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom badminton-themed colors.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Simple validation helpers for numbers, required fields, and YYYY-MM formatted months.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React Query and Internet Identity provider around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page handling month selection, data loading, local editing, and save/delete operations for monthly records.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and typography/plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: JSON file defining project state, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the badminton dashboard.
